channel.title: SnakeRL: Reinforcement Learning on Ricardo Chin

item.title: Off Policy and Neuroevolution
item.author: ricardo.chin@tecnico.ulisboa.pt (Ricardo Chin)
item.description: 1 Reinforcement Deep Q-Network Model # 1.1. LinearQNet and QTrainer Classes # The LinearQNet class represents a simple neural network architecture tailored for Q-value approximation in RL. It consists of two linear layers initialized during instantiation, with the first layer transforming input features to a hidden layer and the second layer producing Q-values for different actions. Additionally, it sets up other optional components, such as dropout regularization or weight initialization techniques, aiming to enhance the network’s learning process and generalization ability.
